root.Summary: 1: Ferdowsi S, Atarodi K, Amirizadeh N, Toogeh G, Azarkeivan A, Shirkoohi R,Faranoush M, Vaezi M, Alimoghaddam K, Ghavamzadeh A, Naghadeh HT, Ghaffari SH.Expression analysis of microRNA-125 in patients with polycythemia vera andessential thrombocythemia and correlation with JAK2 allele burden and laboratory findings. Int J Lab Hematol. 2015 Oct;37(5):661-7. doi: 10.1111/ijlh.12381. Epub 2015 May 25. PubMed PMID: 26011312.
